input: Títí di ìgbà tí ó máa fi kó ẹrù rẹ̀ lọ pátápátá, kí oníkálùkù ní ìtẹ́lọ̀rùn pẹ̀lú ohunkóhun tó bá rí jẹ.
target: Pending the time she would finally pack and go, everybody should be content with eating just anything.

input: Ó mọ bí ó ṣe má a tọ́jú ara rẹ̀ àti Tinú.
target: She knew how best she was going to take care of herself and Tinu.

input: Kí Àlàmú kọ́ bí ó ṣe máa tọ́jú ara rẹ̀.
target: Alamu Should learn to look after himself.

input: Kí ìyá rẹ̀ má tún padà wá láti máa jágbe kí ó sì pòwe ìkà kankan.
target: His old Mama should not come back again and be given the chance to snap and make any further wicked insinuations.

input: Báyìí, ó ti di kí olórí dorí ẹ̀ mú, kí oníkálùkù wà fún ra ara rẹ̀, Ọlọ́run wà fún gbogbo wa.
target: Now it was going to be everybody for himself, God for us all.

input: Làbákẹ́ ń ṣe ìṣe òun ló mọ̀ ọkàn rẹ̀ déédé gbé sókè láti kọ orin rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ohùn òkè, ohùn rẹ̀ dún bí i agogo.
target: Labake assumed a na him sabi posture and found herself suddenly in high spirits, she sang in high pitch, her voice rang like a bell.

input: Ìrísí rẹ̀ fi inú dídùn rẹ̀ hàn.
target: Her countenance was gay.

input: Ó sọ fún ara rẹ̀ pé òun kò ní ìṣòro kankan.
target: She told herself she had no problem.

input: Kò ní nǹkankan láti dààmú fún.
target: Nothing to worry about.

input: Kò sí obìnrin náà lórí ilẹ̀ ní gbogbo ayé tí inú rẹ̀ dún tó bí inú rẹ̀ ṣe dùn.
target: No woman on earth in the whole wide world was ever as happy as she was.

input: Kí ló ṣe tí inú rẹ̀ kò ní dún
target: Why should she not be happy

input: Ọjọ́ rẹ̀ ti níye nínú ilé Àlàmú.
target: Her days were numbered in Alamu's house.

input: Ọjọ́ ìbànújẹ́ àti wàhálà rẹ̀ ti níye.
target: The days of sorrow and tribulations were numbered.

input: Ẹjọ́ ìkọ̀sílẹ̀ ti wà lọ́nà, òun náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ ẹ́ palẹ̀mọ́ àwọn nǹkan rẹ̀ tán.
target: The divorce suit was well on the way, she'd almost finished packing her things.

input: Tinú ò sì fún un ní wàhálà kankan, ọmọbìnrin kékeré náà kúnfún ìyè, ẹ̀mí àlàáfìà tó péye ni Ọlọ́run fi jíǹkí òun fún ara rẹ̀.
target: Tinu gave her no problem, the little girl was full of life and spirit, she herself had been blessed with good health.

input: Ládúrú ìnira tó wà nílẹ̀ ó sì rẹ̀wà síbẹ̀, ìdúró rẹ̀ dún síbẹ̀.
target: In spite of the difficult period at home she'd maintained her pretty look, her elegant posture.

input: Kò sí ẹni tó má ri tá sọ pé obìnrin tó ní ìṣòro ni.
target: Nobody seeing her would ever think she was a woman with problems.

input: Pẹ̀lú ìrísí omidan tí ó ní lọ́wọ́ lọ́wọ́ yìí, ó lè padà sí England kí ó sì tún padà sí àyè oge síse ẹ̀.
target: With her present girlish shape and figure, she could go back to England and re-enter the glamorous world of fashion.

input: Á kàn nílò láti tún ara rẹ̀ ṣe fún bí oṣù mẹ́ta sí mẹ́rin, á padà sípò.
target: She would need only three or four months tuning up and reconditioning her body, then catch up finally.

input: Fún ìdí èyí, kò sí àbámọ̀, ó rẹ́rìn-ín tàríyá-tàríyá, ó palẹ̀mọ̀, ó jó.
target: So no regrets, she sang hilariously, she clapped her hands, she danced.

input: Làbákẹ́ na ẹ̀yìn, ó sì ti àyà sí wájú, ó jupá láìsídìíwọ́, ó ń gbé ẹsẹ̀ sósì sọ́tùn-ún, sọ́tùn-ún sósì, ó ń làágùn
target: Labake straightened her back and threw out her chest, arms swung freely, her feet marked time left, right, left right, she was sweating

input: Ṣùgbọ́n dúró ná ó .kí gan-an ló ń sẹlẹ̀
target: But wait.what really was happening

input: Làbákẹ́ dúró díẹ̀ láti bi ara rẹ̀ ní èyí.
target: Labake stopped briefly to ask herself.

input: Ó sé èémí fún ìṣẹ́jú kan, ó ń wòye.
target: She held her breath minute, pondering.

input: Kíni ìdí fún gbogbo àfihàn ìdùnnú àti ìyírí yìí
target: Why all this show of excitement and intoxication

input: Ṣe òun ti ń ya wèrè Ṣe òun náà ti ń ya wèrè ni
target: Was she going mad Was she going crazy too

input: Rárá, Rárá o, ó dá ará rẹ̀ lóhùn .Rárá.
target: No, No, she answered herself.No.

input: Àlàmú ló ń sínwín, kódà, Àlàmú ló tí ya wèrè.
target: It was Alamu going mad, it was Alamu who had infact, gone mad.

input: Kìí ṣe òun .kì í ṣe òun
target: Not her .Not her

input: Níwájú Ọlọ́run àti ènìyàn
target: Before God and man
